content.en: Deep EEG Classification: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the classification of motor imagery EEG signals using deep learning techniques. These algorithms utilize convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and other methods such as continuous wavelet transform, spatial-frequency-temporal 3D CNN models, and attention mechanisms. By combining these algorithms with image processing methods, transfer learning, and data augmentation, they aim to achieve accurate and robust classification of motor imagery EEG signals, which could have implications for brain-computer interfaces and rehabilitation technologies.
content.da: Dyb EEG-klassificering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre klassificeringen af motorisk forestillings-EEG-signaler ved hjælp af dyb læringsteknikker. Disse algoritmer anvender convolutional neural networks (CNN'er) og andre metoder som kontinuerlig bølgelettransform, rum-frekvens-temporal 3D CNN-modeller og opmærksomhedsmekanismer. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med billedbehandlingsmetoder, transfer learning og dataaugmentation, sigter de mod at opnå nøjagtig og robust klassificering af motorisk forestillings-EEG-signaler, hvilket kunne have betydning for hjerne-computer-grænseflader og rehabiliteringsteknologier.
